               double currentBid,
               java.lang.String auctionID,
               java.lang.String sellerName,
               java.lang.String buyerName,
               java.lang.String itemInfo)
        Constructor with all member variables.
        Parameters:
        timeRemaining - time left for the auction.
        currentBid - current bid on the auction.
        auctionID - id of the auction.
        sellerName - auction's seller's name.
        buyerName - name of auction's highest bidder.
        itemInfo - some info about the auction.

        Parameters:
        bidderName - name of the bidder.
        bidAmt - amount to be bid.
